submission:
from collections import defaultdict
import bisect

class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        n = len(nums)
        map_ = defaultdict(list)
        list_ = []
        
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n - i - 1]
            diff = abs(a - b)
            X = max(a, b, k - a, k - b)
            map_[diff].append(X)
            list_.append(X)
        
        ans = n
        list_.sort()
        
        for diff, values in map_.items():
            T = bisect.bisect_left(list_, diff)
            T = T * 2 + (n // 2 - T)
            
            for X in values:
                if X < diff:
                    T -= 2
                else:
                    T -= 1
            
            ans = min(ans, T)
        
        return ans
